it surprising that Washington Examiner writer Mike Pence Barone would contend "old rules don't apply to" the 2012 Republican primary election campaign even though every Republican presidential nominee since Ronald Reagan in 1980 has been pro-life. The next rule that needs to be debunked is that Republican candidates must pass a litmus test on cultural issues, especially abortion.
